comment: form exhibits morphophonological process(es) such as assimilation or fusion
form exhibits a tone alternation triggered by the stem
form contains morphemes that can variably order
form that does not contain a marker for future tense (that is there in other forms with the same scenario)
form that does not contain a marker for plural (that is there in other forms with the same scenario)
unmarked form (most general, most frequent, etc.) or form that has no other tag
form is a hortative (not from declarative paradigm)
